system.requirements:
Tier 2; Weapon Skill 35
Aptitudes: Weapon Skill, Offence, Khorne
system.effect:
On a successful hit of an All Out Attack, can use Reaction to make another attack with the same bonuses/penalties as the original attack.
Note using a reaction in this way means the character cannot Parry or Dodge until their next turn.
